column1: understand the matter and make a declaration to that effect.”
The Agreement in the instant case contains the following declaration: –

column2: ‘The Guarantor hereby renounces the rights to claim that the Hirer should
be excussed in the first instance and all other benefits to which sureties are
by law entitled, it being agreed that he is liable, in all respects under this

column1: Agreement,  to  the  same  extent  and
column2: in  the  same  manner  as  the  Hirer

column1: including the liability to be sued before recourse is had to the Hirer.’
